rationale: F02 achieved 2.05x higher novelty (0.9796 vs 0.4775) - analyzing parameter differences

mode.hypothesis: BALANCED mode may allow more diverse exploration than CREATIVE

dialectic_ratio.hypothesis: Lower dialectic ratio (more thesis/antithesis, less synthesis) increases novelty

entropy.hypothesis: PRIMARY DRIVER: 50% higher entropy = 2.05x higher novelty

entropy_vs_novelty.interpretation: Each 1% increase in entropy yields ~2.1% increase in novelty

dialectic_ratio_vs_novelty.interpretation: Lower dialectic ratio (more thesis/antithesis debate) increases novelty

evidence: BALANCED achieved 2.05x higher novelty than CREATIVE
mode_vs_novelty.interpretation: BALANCED mode may provide better novelty when combined with high entropy

key_insights.insight: Entropy is the primary driver of novelty
key_insights.evidence: 50% increase in entropy (0.6→0.9) yields 105% increase in novelty
key_insights.actionable: Increase default entropy from 0.6 to 0.8-0.9 for all forks

key_insights.evidence: 33% decrease in dialectic_ratio (0.6→0.4) correlates with 105% novelty increase

key_insights.insight: BALANCED mode outperforms CREATIVE mode when entropy is high
key_insights.evidence: F02 (BALANCED, entropy=0.9) > F10 (CREATIVE, entropy=0.6) in novelty
key_insights.actionable: Pair BALANCED mode with high entropy (0.8-0.9), CREATIVE with moderate (0.5-0.7)

key_insights.insight: F10 was selected as 'best' despite lower novelty
key_insights.evidence: F10 has lowest entropy (0.6) but was ranked #1 by swarm selection
key_insights.actionable: Selection criteria may prioritize safety/stability over pure novelty - validate selection weights

recommended_configuration.rationale: Combine all high-novelty parameters from F02

alternative_configurations.name: Aggressive Exploration
alternative_configurations.rationale: Push both drivers (entropy + low dialectic) to extremes

alternative_configurations.name: Hybrid Mode Test
alternative_configurations.rationale: Test if CREATIVE mode + F02 parameters improves over BALANCED

validation_experiment.failure_criteria: Any config triggers continuity_ratio <0.9 or regression_pass_rate <0.9

impact_on_nos.rationale: Entropy is 1/4 of NOS, so 0.17 novelty gain * 0.25 weight = 0.0425, but novelty is only part of entropy component

risks.risk: Low dialectic ratio (0.4) may reduce synthesis quality
risks.mitigation: Maintain critique_depth=1 to ensure quality checking

risks.risk: F10 was selected as 'best' for non-novelty reasons
risks.mitigation: Validate selection criteria - may prioritize stability over novelty

next_actions: Update swarm fork generation to favor entropy 0.8-0.9 range

Monitor continuity_ratio and regression_pass_rate during rollout
